name: LIT killah: The Game
description:
Free and fun game. Test your musical skills!

Listen to the music, follow the rhythm and use your musical reflexes with LIT killah. Feel the music!

Play the notes at the perfect time, customize your avatar and unlock new challenges. Get over yourself and create your own levels with the original LIT killah songs to share with your friends and the world. Show your flow!

The free entertainment app you need! Let the rhythm guide you!

Game Features:
50 levels for you to show your skills
12 difficulty modes
Get new outfits as you improve
Notes synchronized in time with the song
Customize your avatar
Collect the wardrobe for each videoclip
Create custom levels and challenge your friends
Unlock exclusive accessories by completing different dares
Very intuitive and easy to use

Play and have fun with “Bufón”, “Apaga el Celular”, “Si Te Vas”, “Eclipse” y “Tan Bien” by the amazing Argentine artist LIT killah. The songs of the moment!

Download this free app now! No Internet or WiFi needed. Entertainment guaranteed at any time!
